SBTCVM Settings
To toggle an on/off setting, click the switch button
To toggle a arrow selector setting, click either the left or right arrows to cycle through the available options.
To change the CPU speed preset, click on the desired option.
To reset settings to standard defaults, click "reset". (you must save for this to take effect!)
To save settings, click "save" To quit, click "quit" To cancel changes, click "quit", WITHOUT clicking "save".
